Sermons. Selected sermons
titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by P. S[hort] for Cutbert Burby [and William Leake],

notesStmt.note: The first part includes "The trumpet of the soule sounding to judgement", "The sinfull mans search", "Maries choice", and "The first sermon of Noahs drunkennesse". "Two sermons" (i.e. "The sinners conversion" and "The sinners confession" with prayers appended) has separate dated title page with imprint ".. printed .. for William Leake .."; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
